genmean: Something round placed through the nose, such as a nose ring, or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, especially a bull.
oldentry: Popular explanation: something round through the nose.
verblex: 1. To have or to wear a nose ring.
nomlex: 1. A male animal of the cow family. English = bull.
2. A piece of jewellery worn in the nose. English = nose ring.
